oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A young man of the Early Race marries =nerru (also a person of the Early Race). They are out collecting 'Bushman rice' and fill their bag, so the husband asks |nerru to use her kaross. She does not want to and he snatches it away from her. =nerru's bowels come pouring down. She replaces her bowels and returns to her mother's house. Her husband comes along looking for his wife, but =nerru's mother is angry with him for his lack of understanding.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: =nerru and her husband
